Milt and Rich,

This seems to have started when Yahoo changed the photo file structure from folders to albums.  The global privilege settings have not changed, so you're supposed to be able to post photos.  Here's something to try -- create a new album and try to put your photos in there.  I'm guessing that the problem may be happening when you try to update an old folder that has been converted to the new format.

I haven't had a problem putting photos in newly created albums, but haven't tried uploading anything to an old one.  Rich also has moderator privileges on this list, so he should be able to do whatever I can, other than delete the whole thing.
Jim 




  Jim,
  I tried to upload a few pics of  tekkotsu to my album, at the very last 
  minutes I got the " error message"..........something about I don't 
  have the previlege to add to the album .
  I don't feel like I have  " sox in my mouth ", what gives ?

  milt
